query: Explain quantum mechanics in one line.

evidence.text_snippet: AI-Pass is an AI Operating System that provides: - A unified AI workspace - An agent execution engine - An automation engine similar to n8n - An AI wallet with credits - Built-in governance and audit logs - A marketplace of AI applications AI-Pass focuses on reliable, evidence-based decisions rather than chat.

AI-Pass is an AI Operating System that provides: - A unified AI workspace - An agent execution engine - An automation engine similar to n8n - An AI wallet with credits - Built-in governance and audit logs - A marketplace of AI applications AI-Pass focuses on reliable, evidence-based decisions rather than chat.
